full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` GSER 'OD DAM PA MDO SDE DBANG PO'I RGYAL PO KLAG PA'I CHO GA BKRA SHIS DGE LEGS SPEL BA'I NYI MA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015A *, ,(CES 'PHAGS PA GSER 'OD DAM PA MDO SDE DBANG PO'I KLAG PA'I CHO GA BKRA SHIS DGE LEGS SPEL BA'I NYI MA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RIGS RUS PHUN SUM TSOGS SHING DANG STOBS DANG LDAN PA THU SHE YE GUNG HA LA'I TA'I CHING BSOD NAMS DBANG PHYUG ZHES BYA BAS, DAM PA RNAMS KYI LUNG BSTAN LA BRTEN NAS GSER 'OD MANG DU 'DON DGOS PA'I TSE DNGUL GYI MAndAL KHA BTAGS DANG BCAS PA 'DI @015B LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BKA' STZAL BA DANG BLANGS TE, DAM PA RNAMS KYI ZHABS RDUL SPYI BO LEN PA'I BTZUN GZUGS ^YE SHES DON GNYIS LHUN GRUB KYIS RANG LO NYER DGU'I THOG MDO KHO NA'I LUGS DANG MTHUN PAR SBYAR NAS, PHYIS RTZOM BYANG BKON DE RDZOGS PAR BGYIS PA'I YI GE PA NI MGON GNYER DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN NYE GNAS DGE SLONG CHOS BRTZON 'THUS KYIS BRIS 'DIS KYANG THUB PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOG DUS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA DANG, ,SBYIN PA'I BDAG PO RNAMS KYIS GTZO BYAS RANG GZHAN SEMS CAN THAMS CAD LA PHAN BDE RGYA CHEN PO 'BYUNG BAR GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
author_simple: YE SHES DON GNYIS LHUN GRUB,
